word:
A Wise Youthful Attitude.--Wise is that young man and highly blest who feels it to be his duty, if he has parents, to look up to them, and if he has not, who regards his guardian, or those with whom he lives, as counselors, as comforters, and in some respects as his 
                                                                           99
rulers, and who allows the restraints of his home to abide upon him.
